item.description:
Please join us at the Bleacher Bar after Saturday afternoons Sox Yankees Game for a Meet and Greet Post Game Happy Hour with the Bay Area Boston Sports Fans Meetup Group. 

When the game is over, all Natives and friends attending the 4:10pm game should immediately head over to the Bleacher Bar where we will welcome Leader Joyce of the Bay Area Boston Sports Fans Meetup.  Approximately 25 Sox fans from this San Fancisco Meetup are in town for the weekend attending the Yankees series and pub crawling all over the Fenway area. Many have Boston connections while others have never been to the Bleacher Bar (where many Natives spend long, cold, winter, Thursday nights playing Trivingo.)

Approximate end of game is around 7:30pm.

We will hang at the Bleacher Bar for a while. Might we crawl elsewhere from there? Join us and see what happens.

Others not attending the game are welcome and should plan on being inside the Bleacher Bar early as the place will be packed!

All Bay Area Members please check with your Fearless Leader Joyce for any updates and changes.     

There is a full food and beer menu available for purchase.

Bleacher Bar is unique in that it is located beneath the Fenway Park bleachers in centerfield with a window looking out into Fenway Park. Access is from Lansdowne Street.

For more info on the bleacher bar www.bleacherbarboston.com
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Manager Ryan, Hostess Melinda, Bartender Joe upon arrival for the Red Sox Natives
item.name: Post Yankees Game Meet & Greet with Bay Area-Boston Sports Fans Meetup
